content: **size ** with size 50 thread and a #12 hook approximately 9-1/2 inches in diameter with size 60 and a #13 hook approximately 9 inches in dover publications *crocheting doilies* the title of this pattern is roman candle in *crochet fantasy christmas special 1984* the table center with red roses pattern 12 is worked with red roses and green accents dmc pearl cotton #5 and a 1 5mm hook are used #pinwheel
